players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
You: "That's a bold lie, Charlie. I'm a villager. Why are you trying to frame me when we just lost Alice?"
Diana: "Charlie, if you're really the detective, that's crucial information. Bob, can you explain what you think happened to Alice and why Charlie would lie?"
You: "Diana, if Charlie were the detective, why would he investigate me first night instead of someone more suspicious? He's likely the mafioso trying to eliminate a villager."

Diana: "Charlie, you claim to be the detective who investigated Bob. Bob, you're claiming to be a villager. One of you is lying. Charlie, why did you choose Bob specifically to investigate on night 1?"
Charlie: "I investigated Bob and he is mafia. As detective, I chose him randomly first night - no prior info. Trust me or we lose."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
